text: A floor plan (floorplan) in architecture and building engineering is a diagram, usually to scale, of the relationships between rooms, spaces and other physical features at one level of a structure. Similar to a map the orientation of the view is downward from above. == Examples == Image:HouseFlrPlan.svg|Typical basic house floor plan. Image:Sample Floorplan.jpg|A sample floor plan for a single-family home Image:Carvansara_plan.png|A sample floor plan of a Caravanserai File:Plan de l'église Sainte-Madeleine de Besançon 2.svg|A rectangular floor plan of a Church File:Cathedral.svg|A Cathedral using a Latin cross plan ==Related pages== *Building *Floor *Plans (drawings) Category:Architecture
title: Floor plan
